title: Bug 4971 - Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971 - Strange 'copy package' is occurring when performing the following steps: 1. Open org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui 3. 2. Select xxx as the destination. As a result, the package 'ui' is being copied into xx.
OB: After performing the steps mentioned above, the package 'ui' is present in xx.
EB: Currently, it is not clear what the expected behavior should be in this scenario.
SR: To resolve this issue, further analysis is needed to determine the expected behavior and whether the package 'ui' should or should not be copied into xx.
